title: Acupuncture for Weight Loss (Paperback)
description: Obesity is a serious, wide-spread, stubborn problem. It's a significant risk factor for morbidity and mortality associated with a greater risk for medical conditions. Obesity treatment of Acupuncture has shown significant results in obesity. Acupuncture method is nature medicine, non-toxic medicine and has no side-effect in patients. It is recognized by WHO.
cleaned_text: Acupuncture for Weight Loss (Paperback) $39.00 Usually Ships in 1-5 Days Description Obesity is a serious, wide-spread, stubborn problem. It's a significant risk factor for morbidity and mortality associated with a greater risk for medical conditions. Obesity treatment of Acupuncture has shown significant results in obesity. Acupuncture method is nature medicine, non-toxic medicine and has no side-effect in patients. It is recognized by WHO. This book tells you about acupuncture points for weight loss. This book tells you about acupuncture points for treatment of patient pattern. This book is for Acupuncture students
